metadata.title: CVE-2024-42284 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:tipc: Return non-zero value from tipc_udp_addr2str() on errortipc_udp_addr2str() should return non-zero value if the UDP mediaaddress is invalid. Otherwise, a buffer overflow access can occur intipc_media_addr_printf(). Fix this by returning 1 on an invalid UDPmedia address.
